title: Leifheit Comfortline Juice Extractor, White/Transparent
features: With double cone for the pressing of small and large citrus fruits
Large container with measuring scale and spout
Made of high quality sturdy plastic
description: A press for all citrus fruits: the Leifheit comfort line citrus press made of high quality plastic offers a double cone to press small and large citrus fruits easily. The small cone is suitable for lemons, limes and mandarins. For the pressing of oranges or grapefruits simply turn the upper part to use the large cone. A large container with measuring scale contains the juice of several fruits. A practical spout enables non-drip pouring into a glass.
